title: Inferious Wakusei Senshi Gaiden Condition Green
synopsis: Keith, George, Edward, Yang and Shaw are Platoon #801, the five-man team formed to protect their homeworld in the Inferious galaxy from alien invasion. Gazaria's evil emperor Vince conquers the neighbor worlds of Kal and Granad, and suddenly only Platoon #801, also known as Condition Green, stands between him and the conquest of Emerald Earth.
characters: ['Novellum, Yan', 'Yazaki, Shou', 'Winter, Keith', 'Garedean, George', 'Maclegan, Edward', 'Patty', 'Maria', 'Frayley, Paula', 'Emmit, Phil', 'Skarr, Yent']
